After I install the game, can I delete the files from the unzipped torrent?  (After I seed it for a while, of course!)

Hello,

@yesalmsot

Yes, you can delete those files, but if you do so, you CAN NOT seed any more.
(If you delete the files of the extracted .rar file you downloaded, you can still seed, but if you delete the actual .rar file itself, you can't seed any more)
